hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'gh pr create|git commit'; then ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null) && cd "$ROOT" && echo '=== Pre-commit checks ===' && cargo fmt --all --check && cargo clippy --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace --exclude kylix-slh-dsa; fi
